title: How To Stay Organized And Sane As A Busy Mom
summary: A list of checklists for your daily routine is a great way to stay organized as a busy mom. Cleaning as you go will ensure that messes donâ€™t become overwhelming and cause you to avoid cleaning altogether. Set a timer to help you stay on top of multiple tasks. Find a cleaning buddy or two can help keep you motivated to get things done. Schedule in time for self-care for yourself and carve out some time each week to do something that makes you feel relaxed and happy.

Having a checklist for your daily routine will help you to stay on top of things more easily, so you don\u2019t have to worry about forgetting something. If you\u2019re feeling disorganized, a checklist can help you get back on track. You can even print them out and post them somewhere you can easily see them, such as on your fridge or bathroom mirror."),mdx("p",null,"Here are some daily routine checklists you can use."),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},"Morning routine checklist: Things like getting kids ready for school or extracurricular activities, making lunches, brushing teeth, etc.")),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},"After school routine checklist: Things like cleaning up the house, walking the dog, putting the kids to bed, etc.")),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},"Evening routine checklist: Things like making sure the kids\u2019 homework is done, checking the calendar for the next day, etc.")),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},mdx("p",{parentName:"li"},"Bedtime routine checklist: The last thing you want to do at the end of a long day is to fight with your kids about brushing their teeth or putting on pajamas. This \u201Cshoulder\u201D friend could be a family member, another mom, your partner, a close friend, etc."),mdx("p",null,"The key to successfully using this strategy is to choose someone who is willing to listen without judging you, criticizing you, or trying to \u201Cfix\u201D your problems. Someone who is willing to simply listen, ask questions if they don\u2019t understand what you\u2019re going through, and empathize with you."),mdx("h2",null,"Make a chore wheel"),mdx("p",null,"A chore wheel is a great way to keep track of chores and avoid arguments about who does what. Simply create a chore wheel with the different chores for your home, and assign each person one or two chores. This can work for kids and adults. There are also chore wheels you can use online, or you can create your own using a dry erase board or poster board."),mdx("p",null,"Keep in mind that this is just a visual way of keeping track of chores, not a way of assigning them. You can\u2019t assign a chore to someone because they \u201Cowe\u201D you. You could also assign each person a \u201Cprivilege\u201D or \u201Cperk\u201D that they get to pick, like getting the first use of the car on a certain day, having a special dessert once a week, etc."),mdx("h2",null,"Make cleaning a habit"),mdx("p",null,"Making cleaning a habit is a great way to stay organized and not have to stress about keeping a clean house all the time. Choose one cleaning task each week and make it into a regular habit. For example, every Sunday do some sort of cleaning task like sweeping and mopping floors, washing dishes, etc. Once you make it a habit, it will be something you don\u2019t even have to think about. You can also set aside a certain day of the week for certain cleaning tasks. For example, have cleaning day on Saturday, or make Friday \u201Cbathroom cleaning day\u201D. This can help keep you from feeling totally overwhelmed."),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Make cleaning a habit: Make cleaning a habit."),mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},"Declutter regularly: Clutter can make it harder to keep your house clean and organized. relatedArticles.title: How the Pandemic Is Changing the Way We Work

intro.compiledSource:
var u=Object.defineProperty,l=Object.defineProperties;var m=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var o=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,s=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,n,t)=>n in e?u(e,n,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):e[n]=t,i=(e,n)=>{for(var t in n||(n={}))r.call(n,t)&&h(e,t,n[t]);if(o)for(var t of o(n))s.call(n,t)&&h(e,t,n[t]);return e},d=(e,n)=>l(e,m(n));var c=(e,n)=>{var t={};for(var a in e)r.call(e,a)&&n.indexOf(a)<0&&(t[a]=e[a]);if(e!=null&&o)for(var a of o(e))n.indexOf(a)<0&&s.call(e,a)&&(t[a]=e[a]);return t};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(t){var a=t,{components:e}=a,n=c(a,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,d(i(i({},layoutProps),n),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Time is money, as the saying goes. And when you\u2019re grappling with pandemic disease and a global outbreak, time spent at work has a whole different set of implications.
Pandemic flu strains have decimated human populations since the first recorded pandemic in 541 AD. Over the centuries, outbreaks have been frequent enough to instill fear in even the most stoic among us.
Today we face another pandemic threat with the potential to be even more devastating than those which came before it. A highly virulent strain of influenza A virus known as influenza pandemia has begun spreading rapidly throughout much of the world.
In many ways, today\u2019s workplace is very different from that of a century ago. Technology has advanced; office structures are more open and collaborative; and workers are expected to demonstrate self-motivation and flexibility in order to thrive in an ever-changing workplace environment.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Adopting a Pet and What to Know about Australian Labradoodles

It\u2019t also a kind and selfless act, as you are giving another creature a second chance at life. However, adopting a pet can be quite the ordeal. You must first understand the ins and outs of owning pets, choose whether you want to adopt an adult or juvenile animal, narrow down your selection of potential pets by checking their housing requirements, veterinarian references and character traits, and finally interview prospective pets before bringing them home with you.
There are many different types of animals that you can adopt as a pet. Read on to find out more about adopting an Australian labradoodle as your new pet!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

var d=Object.defineProperty,c=Object.defineProperties;var h=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var i=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var n=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,s=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var p=(e,t,o)=>t in e?d(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):e[t]=o,r=(e,t)=>{for(var o in t||(t={}))n.call(t,o)&&p(e,o,t[o]);if(i)for(var o of i(t))s.call(t,o)&&p(e,o,t[o]);return e},u=(e,t)=>c(e,h(t));var l=(e,t)=>{var o={};for(var a in e)n.call(e,a)&&t.indexOf(a)<0&&(o[a]=e[a]);if(e!=null&&i)for(var a of i(e))t.indexOf(a)<0&&s.call(e,a)&&(o[a]=e[a]);return o};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(o){var a=o,{components:e}=a,t=l(a,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,u(r(r({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Mediation is an increasingly popular alternative to litigation for resolving disputes outside of court. Parties agree to have a neutral third-party called a mediator act as an intermediary, bringing opposing parties together to resolve their dispute and avoid expensive and time-consuming court proceedings.
If you are involved in a lawsuit or other legal conflict, mediation can be beneficial in several ways. It can help you resolve your dispute faster and cheaper than going to trial. Mediation also has the potential to preserve your relationship with the other party after the dispute is resolved, which may prove useful if you anticipate interacting with that person again in the future. Lastly, mediation may give you more control over how your dispute is resolved, as opposed to leaving that up to an unpredictable judge or jury.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Resolve Conflicts through Mediation

intro.compiledSource:
var p=Object.defineProperty,u=Object.defineProperties;var l=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var i=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,s=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(o,t,e)=>t in o?p(o,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:e}):o[t]=e,a=(o,t)=>{for(var e in t||(t={}))r.call(t,e)&&h(o,e,t[e]);if(i)for(var e of i(t))s.call(t,e)&&h(o,e,t[e]);return o},c=(o,t)=>u(o,l(t));var d=(o,t)=>{var e={};for(var n in o)r.call(o,n)&&t.indexOf(n)<0&&(e[n]=o[n]);if(o!=null&&i)for(var n of i(o))t.indexOf(n)<0&&s.call(o,n)&&(e[n]=o[n]);return e};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(e){var n=e,{components:o}=n,t=d(n,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,c(a(a({},layoutProps),t),{components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Mediation is a process in which an impartial third party helps two people resolve their differences and reach an equitable solution to their conflict. The mediator doesn\u2019t take sides, but instead helps both parties understand each other\u2019s point of view. This way, the disputants can agree on a fair outcome and put an end to their disagreements.
If you are part of an organization that is going through a lot of conflict right now (or any time soon), mediation might be a good solution for reducing tensions, smoothing things over and getting everyone back on track. Here we\u2019ll explain what mediation is, why it works so well for resolving conflicts and how you can initiate it in your organization.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

How to Train Your Dog to Leave It

Fussing and fuming won\u2019t make them any less likely to follow you anywhere, or to notice that bag of chips you just carelessly threw on the table. Dogs are dogs, which means they will follow your slightest lead and chip in with their two cents at every opportunity. Sadly, this also means that it\u2019s not uncommon for dogs to get into things they shouldn\u2019t. You like peace and quiet? Not so much when there\u2019s a dog around. You like keeping your things? Good luck with that.
But luckily, with some bit of training and persistence, you can teach your pup exactly what\u2019s off limits and exactly where to leave it instead. Best of all, all these tricks take very little time and effort on our part. It doesn\u2019t have to be hard! Let\u2019s check out how!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

With the rise of social media, cat videos and memes have taken over the internet. There are so many funny cats online that it\u2019s almost ridiculous. These kitty clips have gained a massive following online and catapulted these lovable felines into superstardom.
Cats are a part of Internet Culture in ways that other animals just aren\u2019t. They also have unique features that make them much easier to anthropomorphize and create humorous images with. This has led to an explosion in popularity among cats of all kinds, but especially hilarious ones like Grumpy Cat, Henrietta, and Lil Bub. Now let\u2019s take a look at the Top 10 Famous Cats In The World:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

But that hasn\u2019t stopped cat lovers from all over the world falling head over heels in love with these cuddly felines. Whether you like them for their beauty, intelligence or simply for their cuteness, there is no denying that cats make wonderful pets.
There are a wide range of different breeds of cat but generally speaking there are two main categories; longhaired and shorthaired cats. Within these two groups there are numerous sub-groups and hybrids with specific traits from different types of cat \u2013 check out this article to learn more about the basic types of cat!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
